text: int sum ( int m , int s , int n , int a [ n ] [ n ] , int i , int j ) { if ( i >= n || a [ i ] [ j ] == - 1 ) { if ( s > m ) return s ; else return m ; } else { s = s + a [ i ] [ j ] ; m = sum ( m , s , n , a , i + 1 , j ) ; if ( a [ i + 1 ] [ j + 1 ] > a [ i + 1 ] [ j ] ) m = sum ( m , s , n , a , i + 1 , j + 1 ) ; return m ; } } int main ( void ) { int t , n , m = 0 , i = 0 , j = 0 , x ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; for ( x = 0 ; x < t ; x ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; int a [ n ] [ n ] ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { for ( j = 0 ; j < n ; j ++ ) a [ i ] [ j ] = - 1 ; } for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { for ( j = 0 ; j <= i ; j ++ ) scanf ( "%d" , & a [ i ] [ j ] ) ; } m = sum ( - 1 , 0 , n , a , 0 , 0 ) ; printf ( "%d\n" , m ) ; } return 0 ; }
